title: LOOKING FOR COMPETITIVE SPIRITED PEOPLE (MUST BE BRISBANE BASED)
body:
We are looking to build a team within Brisbane as there is a very exciting upcoming event in the next month or so, winning this particular event will grab a net profit of at least $5,000 for the team.

Requirements
* Must live in Brisbane OR are willing to transport themselves to the destination. (more details will be given upon acceptance into team).
* We are looking for an ADC and a SUPPORT.
* ADC MUST at least be DIAMOND ranked.
* SUPPORT MUST at least be DIAMOND ranked.

replies.body: shouldnt they both be diamond, not always comfortable supporting plat players, (not interested just saying)
User goin4ya can fill any role and fit all requirements
I would be interested in joining If u are still looking
yeap i will add you now
thanks for being honest and applying however, there is a strict diamond only requirement
that's all good with that but wouldn't mind if one time yu might be free to maybe play a game with me and give me some tips or something
